TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegularExpressionValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator

summary.span: 驗證相關聯之輸入控制項的值，是否符合規則運算式指定的模式。

span.span: Validates whether the value of an associated input control matches the pattern specified by a regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓您檢查輸入控制項的值是否符合規則運算式所定義的模式。The control checks whether the value of an input control matches a pattern defined by a regular expression. 這種驗證可讓您檢查有可預測的序列的字元，例如在電子郵件地址、 電話號碼和郵遞區號。This type of validation allows you to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in email addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes. > [!NOTE] > 如果是空的輸入的控制項，就會成功驗證。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 如果值需要相關聯的輸入控制項，請使用控制除了控制項。If a value is required for the associated input control, use a control in addition to the control. 除非瀏覽器不支援用戶端驗證或用戶端驗證已明確停用，執行伺服器端和用戶端驗證 (藉由設定屬性設`false`)。Both server-side and client-side validation are performed unless the browser does not support client-side validation or client-side validation is explicitly disabled (by setting the property to `false`). 規則運算式驗證的實作是在用戶端的伺服器上稍有不同。The regular-expression validation implementation is slightly different on the client than on the server. 在用戶端，使用 JScript 規則運算式語法。On the client, JScript regular-expression syntax is used. 在伺服器上，使用語法。On the server, syntax is used. JScript 因為規則運算式語法是子集語法中，建議使用 JScript 規則運算式語法，以產生用戶端和伺服器上相同的結果。Since JScript regular expression syntax is a subset of syntax, it is recommended that JScript regular-expression syntax be used in order to yield the same results on both the client and the server. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用內控制控制項，請確定驗證程式控制項和其相關聯的控制項位於相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需使用詳細資訊控制項的部分頁面更新，請參閱[網頁局部呈現概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For additional information about validation controls, see . 如需有關規則運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 規則運算式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用驗證五位數郵遞區號的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the control to validate a five-digit postal code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Adds to the specified object the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓一律會顯示錯誤訊息為粗體。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always displays as bold. [!code-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender`定義在上述範例中，Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the use the `CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender` control, defined in the preceding example, on a Web Forms page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 指出輸入控制項中的值是否有效。

span.span: Indicates whether the value in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果輸入控制項中的值有效，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使它會始終檢查針對運算式中的相符項目值。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always checks the value against the expression for a match in a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid`定義在上述範例中，Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid` control, defined in the preceding example, on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定作業逾時之前執行單一比對作業的最大時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or set the maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.

value.span: 作業逾時之前執行單一比對作業的最大時間間隔。

span.span: The maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定規則運算式，其決定用來驗證欄位的對比模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression that determines the pattern used to validate a field.

value.span: 指定用來驗證欄位格式的規則運算式字串。

span.span: A string that specifies the regular expression used to validate a field for format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定用來檢查有可預測的序列的字元，例如身分證號碼、 電子郵件地址、 電話號碼和郵遞區號中的模式。Use this property to specify the pattern used to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in social security numbers, email addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes. 不會對空字串執行驗證。The does not perform validation on an empty string. 如果您要測試的字串可能是空的使用以及。If the string you are testing might be empty, use the as well as the . 如需有關規則運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 規則運算式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您遇到問題的模式比對建構時，請嘗試包裝在運算式"^ （「 和 」） $"。If you experience problems with pattern matching constructs, try wrapping the expression with "^(" and ")$". 例如，"|ab"會變成"^ (|ab) $"。For example, "a|ab" becomes "^(a|ab)$". 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性驗證具有五位數字的欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a field with five numeric digits. 當按一下控制項時，產生事件處理常式會檢查屬性若要判斷是否中的文字符合規則運算式。When the control is clicked, the resulting event handler checks the property of the to determine whether the text in the satisfies the regular expression. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 規則運算式的格式不正確。

span.span: The regular expression is not properly formed.
